mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where your every whim becomes a reality! Get ready to experience the ultimate in banking luxury. 

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into my Bank of Entitlement branch, expecting the red carpet treatment, as always. But what do I see? No red carpet. Can you believe it? I mean, how dare they neglect my VIP status like that? So, naturally, I demand to speak to the manager right then and there. You should have seen the look on his face when I expressed my profound disappointment. Oh, the horror! The nerve of not rolling out the red carpet for Hot Josh! But you know what? They ended up rolling out not just one, but TWO red carpets for me. That's right, double the luxury for yours truly. And that, my friends, is why I will always be the king of entitlement.
